wikipedia_page.main: Adam Walker was born in Retford, Nottinghamshire in 1987. He is an English flautist.

response: The American premiere was recorded, as was the composer's Paris performance with Rampal.Caré, pp. 39–40 There have been many subsequent recordings of the sonata. Among the earlier ones are those by Michel Debost with Jacques Fevrier and Rampal with Veyron-Lacroix. Later recordings include those by Julius Baker with Lisa Logan and Mathieu Dufour with Éric Le Sage. Among recordings singled out in a BBC Radio 3 survey in 2015 are those by  William Bennett with Clifford Benson; Sharon Bezaly with Ronald Brautigam; Patrick Gallois with Pascal Rogé; Emmanuel Pahud with Le Sage; Ileana Ruhemann with Kathron Sturrock; and Adam Walker with James Baillieu.
* In 2019, the Festival featured Edgar Meyer, Dover Quartet, Goldner String Quartet, Tessa Lark, Andrew Tyson, Adam Walker, Aura Go, Konstantin Shamray and Timo-Veikko Valve.
